mean_cn: adj.爱管闲事的，好事的，好插手的
mean_en: interfering with the activities and concerns of other people in an unwanted or unwelcome way :inclined to meddle
sentence: The meddlesome dog irritates the other animals on the farm.
sentence_trans: 这只爱管闲事的狗激怒了农场里的其他动物。
word_etyma: meddle干涉 ＋ some...的 → meddlesome爱管闲事的
